item.title: India Orange Jersey memes
item.description:
Origin

On Jun 28, 2019, BCCI released a new jersey that the Indian cricket team would wear for the Cricket World Cup 2019.

item.title: Week 013 - Bleed Orange, Chahal and Sacred Games 2
item.description: India might be out of the world cup but the memes live on!
